reviews.title: Works in a Small Space in 100 Year Vintage Home
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I recently purchased this small refrigerator, for my almost 100-year-old house! Finding an appliance that fits compact space leaves me with very few options. This fridge, however, almost slid in perfectly but I did have to remove the solid oak vintage trim to get it in there. A plus for me was the reversible door feature. Being able to choose whether it opens to the left or right made all the difference in making it work. Honestly, I don't need my fridge to communicate with me or send text. My only real complaint, and it's a bit of an ongoing one, is that the freezer door tends to pop open whenever I close the main fridge door. I do have to remember to give the freezer a quick check each time to make sure it's sealed properly, so I don't end up with an unexpected thaw. The other thing I miss is a meat drawer. Overall, if you're in a similar situation with limited space or an older home, this fridge is definitely worth considering. Just be mindful of that freezer door!

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Refrigerator is fine, but upon changing door to other side I found out that it is missing 2 bolts that hold the wheels in place? This is a problem and missing from the factory. Still trying to get bolts but it's been a pain so far. So refrigerator isn't level at and not connected, and don't know if there is support to have them installed? I even purchased warranty!

reviews.title: We appreciate no frills
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It's been so far a short time in use. It functions well. It would be good to purchase two temperature gauges at the food store kitchen isle (one for frig,one for freezer) so as to determine if air flow and temp is working to the amount of products inside each compartment to how many times you're opening and closing the doors. It's good enough size for 2 people (and a small dog for whom we make&freeze fresh food every10 days. Read the book and understand the controls for adjustments. I do wish the shelves were a little more sturdy. Possibly. Perhaps an single post for at least the bottom shelf. There's no deli drawer and that's fine for us - we do not.eat cold cuts and besides we use sealed containers. We lived for almost 2months with a mini frig,so, to us This low price frig is a luxury. We appreciate NO FRILLS. Frills break down...our last maytag had a major freezer issue...again, this whirlpool is a comfort and luxury (all about perspective...we are thankful). We have a whirlpool dishwasher, all is well, very quiet like this little frig. The small size also makes it less burdensome for the movers.

reviews.title: Excellent Refrigeration
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I couldn't believe the excellent refrigeration and freezer capabilities on very low knob settings after the first 24 hours of installing. Compared to some other well known brands, the first thing I noticed was the excellent parts and overall construction of this model refrigerator (i.e. all the aluminum plating over the copper coils, this is a plus considering the refrigerator I replaced had cardboard over the coil area, also, the seals on the doors work extremely well In addition to being very energy efficient.) I also noticed Whirlpool added internal vents from the freezer to the refrigeration area, which is probably one of the reasons this model has excellent refrigeration. Although, this refrigerator has three shelves and two drawers at the bottom, I wish they had included a small drawer to the left under the initial top shelf. I'm pretty sure there is room for it, however, I've been able to adapt and I am not disappointed. The freezer seemed perfect, but wished they included a couple of ice cube trays. I guess I'm old fashioned that way. The refrigerator also included a five year warranty and for the price, I believe this was an excellent purchase. Thank you Whirlpool.

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've had this for 6 weeks. It has been extremely hard to adjust the temperatures. When it came, we plugged it in and waited 24 hours to put any food in it - left the controls at factory settings. After 2 days, 2 cans of soda in the fridge froze and exploded. Adjusted controls per the owner's manual. Everything in the freezer thawed. Had to throw it away. It has been 5 days with no adjustments - seems to be working well. This has been very hard to adjust and very frustrating

reviews.title: Nice Fridge
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Very nice fridge!! I like the coils on the back, very easy to clean dust off it. Glass shelves are easy to pull out and clean. Drawers on the bottom hold wine bottles laying down flat and lots of produce:-). Freezer compartment is very roomy and it keeps ice cream nice and cold. Good buy for a smaller fridge.

reviews.title: Spacious but the temp!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love how spacious this fridge is! Being someone who makes everything homemade I always have a packed fridge! The bins in the bottom are nice and roomy so I am no longer smashing my lettuce! My only complaint is it is difficult to get the setting for the freezer to the safe zone! I've had everything pulled away from the back and it isn't stuffed full but it still seems to struggle to get down to the proper temp. Even when the dial is set to Max!

reviews.title: perfect dize
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a refrigerator/freezer I purchased to replace my old appliance that was a second refrigerator/freezer. It was the perfect size to fit the space I has. My only feature that I am not satisfied with is the slope in bottom shelf of freezer.

reviews.title: Best small fridge I could find
reviews.review_text: No problems with this fridge. It is the smaller size that is all that I need, has glass shelves, and runs quietly. In a perfect world it would be counter depth and have a bottom freezer. Until then, I would definitely recommend it to anyone who wants or needs a smaller fridge without the cheap look of wire shelves. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Ok fridge; will be better once fixed
reviews.review_text: This was installed less than 2 weeks ago. For my needs, fridge is perfect with one big exception. Immediately after install, when you walk by the fridge, or close the refrigerator door, the freezer door spontaneously opens. It's annoying as heck. Feels like freezer door is too light. Doors are evenly leveled. Waiting for whirlpool service guy to service next week.

reviews.title: Disappointed!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I feel the refrigerator could be larger inside. I couldn't get a larger one in cubic feet, because of my space. It was set at the recommended temperature and food and water were freezing. There is no place to put my cold cuts. Not very satisfied!

reviews.title: Works Great!
reviews.review_text: Runs nice and quiet and keeps everything cool. I really like this model because it has glass shelves that are easy to keep clean and and it has generous crisper's for fruits and vegetables. I had a Whirlpool before this that lasted 33 years (it could've been fixed but the part is discontinued) I hope this one is just as reliable! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Good Little Refrigerator
reviews.review_text: We bought this to replace our garage refrigerator. We didn't want a large and expensive one. I like the fact that the shelves are adjustable, although with the limited space there are not a lot of options. In addition, the top shelf of the door can only be used for very small items. Overall it's a relatively inexpensive basic refrigerator that is best suited as a second one. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Practical!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I'm very happy with my new Whirlpool fridge. I like the bottom drawers. Very roomy and great for storing fruit and veggies. The shelf in the freezer is nice too. I can store my frozen foods easily. I wish there was a special shelf for ice cubes though.

reviews.title: Great quality for a basic good old refrigerator.
reviews.review_text: I purchased this 14 cu. foot model for a spare. Has been in operation for a month and am very pleased. Admittedly, I thought a small refrigerator without ice maker or other frills would be cheaper, but it appears to be made with quality not found in off-brands.Further, I don't get into these new models with ice/water distribution in the door (makes messes I don't need), or care for new-fangled bottom freezers, and multiple doors that waste space and energy. I would also buy one like this again when needing a larger volume.

reviews.title: Clean lines, ample space, easy access
reviews.review_text: Great for small families, not so small nothing fits but not so big you're wasting money to cool empty space. Easy to clean and access shelves. Is very, very quiet. Definitely would recommend to family and friends. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Just What I needed
reviews.review_text: I replaced a refrigerator that was 38 years old. It had been my main one in the house and when we moved I got a new one and put the old one in the garage for the beer wine and overload. When it died I found that I could not live without an outside refrig. This is just what I needed.

reviews.title: Exceptional&Reliable!!
reviews.review_text: We purchase this Whirlpool refrigerator a few months ago and it is still going strong. We have always been very pleased with the Whirlpool brand for their reliable and dependable appliances. This is why every appliances that we own has the name Whirlpool stamped on it!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Garage Soda Refrigerator
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Bought this model for a garage soda and water cooler here at the beach. With family and friends in and out, it has been a great convienence for all and reduces traffic in and out of the house. Great purchase for a seconday refrigerator.

reviews.title: OK, but noisy
reviews.review_text: Not happy with the amount of time this refrigerator runs, and the high pitched loud noise that it makes. Maybe it is a "lemon", since I've read other reviews claiming it is quiet. Not so with this one. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Sufficient
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I choose this refrigerator because of size and color. A couple comments regarding my overall opinion. #1: does not have a deli tray so I use one of the crisper. #2: the ice maker was complicated to get installed. Not a refrigerator problem but installation responsibility but I do not like the ice taste. Overall, it's ok not what I expected but it will take us through our retirement,

reviews.title: Good refrigerator
reviews.review_text: Purchased a month ago and am happy with it. It is just the right size for my needs. I have always owned whirlpool refrigerators, washers, and dryers and have never been disappointed. They are made well, perform great, and made to last. The price was great and I am very pleased with my purchase. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Simple, yet functional refrigerator. Great value
reviews.review_text: I bought this refrigerator as a second unit for my garage. I needed a simple, no frills refrigerator that was not too large. It's perfect and the price was right. I use it for overflow when family visits or when we have family parties. Whirlpool makes a great product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: A perfect second fridge.
reviews.review_text: we bought this a month ago because we needed an additional refrigerator at our house. this model had plenty of room for our needs, and not a lot of extras. it has performed well over the past month. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Perfect fit and perfect storage!
reviews.review_text: Whenever I have houseguests (and I get lots of them during the year), my kitchen refrigerator always is chockablock-full of food--with very little space for beverages, whether they be prosecco, beer, soda, or water. So this purchase was the perfect thing to solve the problem and to keep me more organized. Besides, I love Whirlpool appliances! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Greatest Features
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am very happy with my new Whirlpool Fridge. It keeps everything nice and cold inside the fridge and the freezer works well even keeping ice cream better than my old fridge. Quiet running also which I love.

reviews.title: It was too big!
reviews.review_text: We were surprised when our new fridge arrived. We had checked the height and width, but not the depth. Our condo kitchen did not have enough room for the doors much less the freezer drawer. We had to return the unit and look for something with less depth. Nothing wrong with the product except size.

reviews.title: Not for everyone
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I purchased the refrigerator about a month ago. It fits perfectly & looks very good. However, be sure it is not too small for you as this is an apartment size refrigerator & does not have adequate space if you are used to a larger one. This is what I chose for me & I do not regret that. However, there are things I'll have to live with that are a problem & weren't an issue in my previous larger Whirlpool refrigerator which may be due to the new one's size. The light inside it is not adequate & the shelves on the door are made so that things can fall right through onto the floor. It has done an excellent job of keeping things at the desired temperature which is the most important thing.

reviews.title: Good features
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Ease at which doors open when opposite handle is touched at same time you pull on handle. Takes only two fingers. Like clear shelving to see lower shelf contents. Miss self defrosting feature of larger more expensive models

reviews.title: Great fridge!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I needed a new refrigerator after my last one almost caught on fire and this was the only one close to the same size of my old one. I love all the door space and how deep the shelves are but there was lubricant smeared all over the bottom drawers and the bottom of the refrigerator so I had to clean a brand new refrigerator which kinda irritated me.

reviews.title: Economical w/Perks
reviews.review_text: I really like this refrigerator. Great deal as it was on sale. I love the glass shelves and the shelf in the freezer. Also has quite a bit of storage space in both the freezer and fridge. Great buy! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Great freezer space
reviews.review_text: I ordered this refrigerator online but went to the store first to make sure it was the size I wanted. I was very impressed. It is smaller than my previous fridge but still very roomy. We buy large amounts of meat so the huge freezer was a must. The shelves in the refrigerator part are adjustable, so we have plenty of room for everything. I am very impressed with my Whirlpool purchase.

reviews.title: Large Storage Area
reviews.review_text: We bought our Whirlpool as a 'second' storage refrigerator. We keep this outside in a storage shed and use it for bottles of water, soda, ice tea, beer, etc., and for large items to be stored until we used them, ex. watermelon for picnic, desserts for parties, party trays after they are made up. It is great for this because the shelves are adjustable and it is easy to clean.

reviews.title: Very satisfied
reviews.review_text: The office break room needed a full size fridge. It did not, however, need to throw a bunch of money at keeping employee treats cool. This fridge satisfied all of our needs and exceeded our expectations. One of the lower priced units we found, it is whisper quiet and has ample space. The drawers seem like they are of good quality and will last a long time. The layout is nice and for an economical fridge, it looks very modern. Temperature is cold and consistent and the freezer, well, it freezes. Couldn't be happier.

reviews.title: Perfect for modest kitchens
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Purchased this a month ago and it's perfect! It may be small, but there's plenty of room inside this workhorse of a refrigerator! The glass shelves make finding everything a breeze, even the items way in the back, The variety of storage options in the door are a bonus!

reviews.title: Perfect fit for my life style.
reviews.review_text: A year ago I bought a larger refrigerator. Had some nice features but I wasn't going to hook up unfiltered well water so some accessories went unused. A few months ago my daughters frig. quit so the only logical thing to do was give her mine and get one more suited to my needs. This Whirlpool is better than advertised and much quieter than lead to believe. I've purchased many appliances in my life but this is the best so far. Keep up the good work. I'm giving 5 stars yet would like to see a light in the freezer however, for the price and performance, this is my perfect unit.

reviews.title: I Like GE
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We decided to buy a new refrigerator, and were pleased to find the same We bought several years ago. We needed one to fit into a unusual space, since it is an old house. There have been some changes, but nothing we found to be negative. We put the older model in our basement, so now we have extra space, when we need it. Our experience with Lowles was very nice, and the delivery men did a great jog. All in all, a nice refrigerator, and we are very pleased.

reviews.title: Fits perfectly in the space we required. Easily accessible.
reviews.review_text: We use this as a back-up refrigerator for baking goods, and liquid libations. Clear shelving and drawers makes it easy to find what we are looking for as needs. The space is ample for our needs. Frozen pizzas, casseroles and pies fit nicely in the freezer.

reviews.title: Great for limited space
reviews.review_text: We needed a smaller refrigerator for a limited space in our basement. After spending a lot of time shopping online I found that this was the only one I could find that was only 28 inches wide and had separate controls for refrigerator and freezer. Reading reviews of other makes there were a lot of complaints about freezer not getting cold enough with our freezing things in the refrigerator. This model solves that problem. A little noiser than I had hoped but all in all we are happy with the purchase. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Great value
reviews.review_text: I bought this frig. for second refrigerator. I have a Samsung for a kitchen appliance. At 1/2 the price the Whirlpool out performs the Samsung hands down. No compressor noise and i believe it is insulated better. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Ideal no-frills refrigerator for small household
reviews.review_text: With one daughter living on her own and another going back to school, our household was shrinking to where we no longer needed our two older refrigerators. We found a good replacement with this model: the shelves are not as rigid as I would like but they are easy to rearrange. The shelf barriers are a good sturdy design. The door seals well and the temperature gauge is easy to reach. We find that we waste less food due to the appropriate size of this model. It's a very reliable product. My son certainly thinks so.

reviews.title: Nice and clean. Fits perfect. Very quiet.
reviews.review_text: Our old 25 year old Whirlpool was having issues. Pipes in freezer were freezing, blocking air flow to refrigerator. Replaced it with this lovely unit. It's nice and cool at 35 degrees. Nice glass shelves. I like being about to see what's in the crispers. The left crisper is for veggies, the right is for BEER. :) [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Compact Refrigerator with Lots of Space Inside!
reviews.review_text: I purchased this refrigerator in late September, 2019, after the compressor blew up on my 36 year old frig. You can't have it all! I like Whirlpool products and like their reliability. Interior compartments are roomy as well as the freezer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Very pleased with my new fridg.
reviews.review_text: My old fridge was dying and making horrible noises so off I went to find a new one and Whirlpool is a name I have always trusted. This little fridge (it's only me now) is Perfect ! It cooled down quickly, it's quiet and it is an energy saver. I am more than pleased with my purchase...(and I could really use a new stove) :)I love that I picked a smaller model ... now I can see to clean the top without a ladder.... it's Perfect ! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Perfect extra frig!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It is quiet and keeps beverages nice and cold. Perfect for our garage as an extra frig. I was told by an appliance repair man that Whirlpool was the only way to go and to make sure you get the longest warranty anyways.

reviews.title: Very good fridge for the money
reviews.review_text: We use this little fridge in the garage as a spare for beverages and when our kitchen fridge is full. Is a little fridge but with enough room for our needs. We paid little money and so far is working great [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Very good value / Very pleased
reviews.review_text: We needed a fridge for the lower level and this one really fit the bill. It has an excellent layout for party needs as well as providing extra storage in addition to the fridge on the main level.We are also using the freezer as extra storage and this fridge has worked out really well for us.It was delivered the next day and installed quickly and easily. Getting the fridge up and running was a snap. It really was easy and has been working great every since.This was a very good purchase.

reviews.title: Spacious!
reviews.review_text: I bought this for a rental property. The fridge compartment offers plenty of shelf space for the three tenants. It's easy to clean too, so they tell me. The freezer compartment is adequate for their needs too. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Lightweight and cold!
reviews.review_text: So far so good. Only had it a month so far. Lets see if its durable. Its spacious inside and its lightweight to carry in a home. Atleast for me it was. Only complaints are the cheap plastic handles. Feels too cheap other than that so far so good. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Nice second refrigerator
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Bought this as a second refrigerator and am very pleased. Turned control knob one setting colder and moved know in freezer to max and it is keeping ice frozen in the freezer, and water cold in the refrigerator. Refrigerator fluctuates from 8 degrees when the compressor is off to 0 or -2 when running. Plenty of room and shelves, not very noisy.

reviews.title: Lots of room.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This refrigerator replaced a smaller one we have in our pantry. This one is larger with more room to store our extras and a case of 40 bottles of water. I love the additional freezer space and the shelf inside too. The glass shelves are a nice upgrade also.

reviews.title: Disappointed in Quality
reviews.review_text: Bought to replace similar model but did not realize it was a step down. Very disappointed in quality. Reversing direction the door swings is a major project and requires removing the door seals and replacing the stick-on Whirlpool logo. Also dismayed to read that it is an explosion hazard. Repeated warnings that glass shelves may shatter if warm water is used to clean them. Foam insulation is poking out on corners of doors. It does cool and freeze so it is a basic refrigerator.

reviews.title: Awesome unit
reviews.review_text: We bought this unit last week. Honestly I had my reservations. BUT.... absolutely love it. It may look small but it's absolutely huge on the inside. It seals so tight and it is so very quiet. This is a definite 5 star and highly recommend!! Awesome job whirlpool!!!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Bigger than you Think!!
reviews.review_text: We needed a second refrigerator for left overs!! Wow, we have been pleasantly surprised by the capacity of this appliance. Freezer and refrigerator areas are generous and it suits our needs perfectly. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Refreshment Fridge
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is perfect for my extra/2nd fridge. Fits perfectly into the space in laundry room and cuts down on traffic from outside needing refreshments. Freezer vents easily blocked I have found and that can be an issue.

reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
reviews.review_text: Bought this for a basement refrigerator - it's awesome! Wanted a beverage fridge and I was impressed that it had glass shelves instead of the vinyl coated wire shelves - bottles just don't stand on them and are always falling over. The freezer was a bonus. The price point on this fridge can't be beat - love this thing! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Would not recommend!
reviews.review_text: I was very disappointed in the use of space ...ex: shelving on doors is so narrow that it does not allow you to store many things that you normally store on the door..including a dozen eggs. If the top shelf is placed at first slot it is NOT tall enough to allow for a gallon of milk...And if lowered down one space the following 2 shelves are spaced so close together they will not accommodate even the basic dishes to be placed on them. How ever the freezer space is OK...and the vegetable drawers are a nice size and slide in and out easily. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.review_text: As a second refrigerator, this unit is perfect for our needs. Very quiet to where I sometimes check to see if it is working. Love the glass shelves compared to wire shelving on comparible units. A bright interior light and simple, straight forward controls. A very good value.

reviews.title: Great for an extra refigerator.
reviews.review_text: I bought this refrigerator to help with the overflow form the main refrigerator. The price was reasonable and gives me a place to store items I need to keep refrigerated but don't get to all the time. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Base Model
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is the base model which allows the buyer to add features. This is a big advantage over the more expansive models, which include many features you may or may not use. The freezer shares the cold air with the refrigerator so that the freezer can accommodate different loads on the freezer compartment, nice feature. It is self defrosting. It satisfies a basic need and does so economically and functionally. Good buy!

reviews.title: Reliable
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This refrigerator is a vast improvement over its predecessor. The freezer is spacious and easily accessed. I love it. My only complaint is my fault not the fridge. I'm tall and while the top mounted freezer is handy, the lower primary refrigerator is less so. In retrospect even though a top freezer is more energy efficient, I'd opt for a bottom freezer. Having said so, I'd still recommend the refrigerator with the caveat it's best suited to the under six foot users.

reviews.title: A Gem!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is the perfect size refrigerator for my small size kitchen. It holds a lot, too. The temperature control is spot on. No blobs of icicles sticking to frozen food in the freezer. The light inside is very pleasing, not too bright, not too dark. All in all, it's a gem of a refrigerator. I was also very happy at the efficiency of the delivery to inside my kitchen,

reviews.title: A good value for the money
reviews.review_text: In this time of pandemic, one picks what is available. This is a good refrigerator with a large freezer but the refrigerator storage options are very limited. There is no milk caddy on the door and what seems a lack of storage for cheese and smaller items. Our former refrigerator dies and we needed something quickly and this was available. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Works like a charm and not noisy.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I live in a small apartment and I wanted a larger refrigerator. So I replaced it with this Whirlpool 14.3 cu model. It's just right, larger and roomier but fits nicely in my apartment. I've had it a month now and it has worked great from the very first. Quality workmanship and cooling & freezing ability. No problems, but I do wish the door shelves were adjustable to make better use of the space.

reviews.title: Large capacity for small place
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really like this refrigerator. It fits in the same spot where I had an older Frigidaire, but this Whirlpool has way more space inside. It's very quiet too and the temperature is well distributed inside.

reviews.title: Whirlpool spun a miracle.
reviews.review_text: I brought this last month to replace a failing Magic Chef refrigerator.After reading reviews I decided to take a chance.My family and I could not be HAPPIER.This product is quiet,cools and freezes quickly,maintains temperature with effeciently.It is roomy and well lit.Fruit so fresh.LOVE IT,LOVE IT!!!!

reviews.title: My black fridge with upper freezer
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Bought a couple weeks ago for guest room small kitchen area. Works fine. There was a chip of black finish out of freezer door which I will try to fix with black nail polish since the black finish is leather like. The freezer door however sticks up higher than top of the fridge and doesn't look right.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.review_text: Very good, simple design. Large capacity inside both refrigerator and freezer. I'm using this in my garage for overflow food and beverages and it has held up amazing in our brutal, hot summer months. Would definitely buy again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Perfect 2nd refrigerator!
reviews.review_text: This refrigerator fits my needs very well, as one to store food for entertaining & drinks. However, I don't understand why all manufacturers make only glass shelving. Why can't wire shelves be an option? They make far more sense, as it pertains to even cooling, as the air circulated through wire better than glass.

reviews.title: A Surprisingly GREAT Basic Refrigerator
reviews.review_text: I needed a fairly compact fridge for a small cabin and the quality of this was so much better than the too-small apartment size units that I decided to pay a little more money to get a lot more refrigerator. I liked the glass shelves and separate controls for fridge and freezer. It arrived factory-set to almost perfect temperatures, cooled quickly and stays very consistent. I don't hear it running and the lighting inside is quite bright. Three weeks later, a storm left us without power for 42 hours. Food was still cold after 24 hours! I moved frozen food to a freezer powered by a generator and used an ice chest for things like milk and mayo. After the power was restored, I was stunned to find the few items left in the fridge were still fairly cold and there were still ice cubes (although wet) in their trays in the freezer! I'm very happy with this purchase.The only thing that would make it better is if there was a drawer for storing meat/cheese, even if it was optional.

reviews.title: Does the job but . . .
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Overall, I'm satisfied with my new Whirlpool refrigerator and hope it will live up to the fine reputation of the company. My main gripe is that the shelves inside the fridge and freezer doors are too narrow (3 1/4") for most containers to fit, and with only a 1" horizontal bar to hold stored items in place, they can slip under the bar and onto the floor when the door is opened. Otherwise, it's quiet and works fine to keep food cold or frozen.

reviews.title: Roomy
reviews.review_text: I bought it for a cottage that has a very small kitchen. With some wall adjustments it fits great and has more room than our old one. It would have even more room if it didn't have these small ledges way in the back of the shelves. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Best choice ever!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I had my old refrigerator for 34 year and had gotten used to its rattling. The new Whirlpool runs so quiet that during the first two days I sometimes opened its door to see if it was still cold/working. I am very satisfied with my selection and the affordable cost.

reviews.title: Very noisy!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] My 20 year-old GE died. Stopped cooling. Literally a melt-down. We bought this model Whirpool because it fit into the space in the kitchen and it was available right away. The delivery was wonderful--on time, efficient, refrigerator started right up. It cools and freezes fine--I have no complaints. It's slightly smaller and with a different configuration from my old fridge, but no matter. The issue is that it is VERY NOISY when it runs---complete silence when it doesn't run. It sounds like the motor is straining, and there are pings and dings as though things are falling inside. It's loud enough to be heard 30 feet away.

reviews.title: smaller than it looks
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Whirlpool brand is reliable. The price was right & this model fits under cabinets in kitchen. It was quiet as a mouse, initially; now, sometimes it ticks like a clock. MAYBE I would recommend, particularly if fridge would serve a single/individual user, rather than an entire family. I like it, just not overwhelmed.

reviews.title: Nice Fridge
reviews.review_text: We had to replace our refrigerator over a month ago because it wasn't working well. We decided on this fridge as it is the same size as the one we had. I'm pretty happy with it...because it works and doesn't have broken shelves and drawers! LOL! Even though it is the same size as the last fridge, it seems to have less fridge space and more freezer space. This difference would be great if we didn't have a chest freezer, but we do and I'd prefer more fridge space.

reviews.title: Glass Shelves make a huge difference!
reviews.review_text: This refrigerator is designed with featured that make a real difference. Things don't tip over on the glass shelves. They are easy to clean. You can see thru the bottom shelves into the crisper drawers so you know what's in there!The in-door shelves help organize items and make the items easier to get to. Somebody really put some thought into the design of this refrigerator.In congratulate myself for making this choice every time I open the door! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: So far, so good - Basic but fine for 1 or 2 people
reviews.review_text: I've only had this two weeks so far, but everything seems to be fine. I downsized to this fridge from a larger one, and it still seems to be adequate for my needs. Basic, no frills, although the glass shelves are a plus, and the option for an icemaker good (although I didn't choose that yet). Freezer is good size. The door shelves are not adjustable, the butter door doesn't close completely with my butter dish in it; the egg carton space isn't large enough for the carton to sit flat, but these are small issues. I didn't want to spend a huge amount, so overall this unit is fine and meets my small household needs. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
